original_title: An Old Fashioned Love Story: Making 'The Bridges of Madison County'
overview: Follow the difficult birth and full realization of this beautifully told romance through its many twists and turns. Through interviews with Clint Eastwood, Meryl Streep, screenwriter Richard LaGravenese and many others, this documentary reveals the commitment, hard work and creativity it took to bring to the screen this classic love story in the style of George Stevens or John Ford.
title: An Old Fashioned Love Story: Making 'The Bridges of Madison County'
